start:
🤖 Hi! I'm an advanced group management bot.
Use /help for commands list
help:
📜 Commands:
/ban - Ban user
/unban - Unban user
/warn - Warn user
/unwarn - Remove warn
/kick - Kick user
/mute - Mute
/unmute - Unmute
/filter - Add filter
/stop - Remove filter
/filters - List filters
/welcome - Welcome messages
/setlang - Change language
/settings - Group settings
user_required: ❗️ Reply to a message or mention user!
no_warns: ℹ️ This user has no warnings
no_filters: ℹ️ No filters in this group
settings_menu:
⚙️ Group settings:

🔧 Options:
1. Delete service messages
2. Link management
3. Warn settings
invalid_time: ⏳ Invalid time format! Use like 5m or 2h
